### Software Engineer (Fullstack)

-----------------------------

Software Engineer taking end-to-end responsibility for envisioning, designing, and developing performance-driven systems. Having more than 4+ years of experience solving Engineering problems @scale.

Work experience with JavaScript, Nodejs, React, Express, Java, SQL, NoSQL, Data Structures and Algorithms, High Level and Low Level (Object-Oriented Design), Redis, Kafka, Postgress, MongoDB, ActiveMQ/RabbitMQ, CI/CD Jenkins, GitLab's CI/CD, ELK stack, Kubernetes, Docker, AWS.

I am a quick learner and passionate about learning new things in tech.

### Projects
#### Software Engineer@Revv
* Notification microservice, triggering all the communications across the platform
* Optimize the website bundle size by code and route splitting which enhanced web vitals.
* Custom payment link and payment page on the website.
*  Developed a Lead Management system from scratch and opt for a robust design pattern.
*  Managing dev environments for all running services on AWS (Apache/Nginx/PM2/Logs).
*  Working on EKS cluster and fargate (EKS, Istio, CloudWatch, Prometheus). 
* Set up Jenkins and created declarative, script pipelines, and pipeline as code.
* Used ELK stake for service logs.
* Image tagging system and uploaded to S3.
* Created HTML to pdf generator.
* Subscription page on the website, where user can manage their booking and raise tickets.
* Developed a test drive portal, where users can book a test drive.
* UTM tracking system, if traffics is coming from campaign/ads/organic.
* Integrated service worker to cache and web push.
#### Software Engineer@LifePage
* Developed Video Conversion Process using FFmpeg, supporting DASH streaming
* Developed Advice Management System and Lead Management System
* Developed Lambda function on serverless framework
* Managed services on AWS
* Worked on PostgreSQL from schema design
* Developed APIs for customer-facing Android/iOS applications
* Integratedâ€‹ â€‹PayTm as payment gateway
